description.en: A compact shoulder/crossbody bag with a clean silhouette and a functional front mesh pocket. Features a zip-top main compartment and adjustable strap—ideal for daily essentials, commuting, and travel organization. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), mesh spec, size, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 简洁实用的单肩/斜挎包，前幅网袋便于快速收纳与取放。主仓拉链闭合，配可调节肩带，适合通勤、日常随身与旅行收纳。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、网布规格、尺寸、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/挂钩/D 环等（可定制）

en.Customization: Fabric, mesh spec, color, size, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 22–28cm × 高 16–20cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、通勤、旅行收纳
zh.可定制: 面料网布规格、配色尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
